column2: BRIEF-Worthington Specialty Processing Says Will Close Its Canton Facility March 19 (Reuters) - Worthington Industries Inc: * WORTHINGTON SPECIALTY PROCESSING ANNOUNCES CONSOLIDATION OF OPERATIONS * WORTHINGTON INDUSTRIES INC - WILL CLOSE ITS CANTON, MICH., FACILITY * WORTHINGTON INDUSTRIES INC - TWO REMAINING FACILITIES IN JACKSON AND TAYLOR, MICH. WILL CONTINUE TO OPERATE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
